system.sustained:
Psyker makes Opposed -10 Willpower vs Target Individual's Toughness. If target fails they suffer 1d10+Psy Rating Nonpermenant damage to their Toughness Characteristic. 
Psyker gains Unnatural Toughness (+1), +1 per 5 full points of Toughness Damage inflicted. This Unnatural Toughness persists as long as power is sustained.
Note: Use Only War Unnatural Characteristics Trait
